msgSnippet: Hi I have written a batch-file to start swingui.TestRunner and pass as parameter the name of the class to test: java junit.swingui.TestRunner
messageBody:
Hi

I have written a batch-file to start swingui.TestRunner and pass as parameter the name of the class to test:

java junit.swingui.TestRunner ufa.test.AllHttpTests

This works perfekt. But now I wold like to pass a parameter to the class ufa.test.AllHttpTests. Is this somehow possible?

I had a look at the methode processArguments in the class BaseTestRunner. It seams that there is now way to do so
